explanation: [0-0] A man with curly hair is standing on a football field, wearing a black top. He holds up a smartphone towards the camera, the screen displaying a picture of Harry Kane. The time on the phone shows 16:30.
[0-4] As he lowers the phone, a smiling Harry Kane appears behind him, wearing a blue top. The man in black reacts with surprise and briefly touches Harry Kane.

[4-9] A young boy in a gray top holds a smartphone in his left hand. He flips the phone, the screen now showing a picture of Cristiano Ronaldo wearing a black suit, white shirt and blue tie. As he lowers the phone, Cristiano Ronaldo appears behind the young man, smiling. A small skull icon appears on the left side of the screen, and the image shakes.
